name: ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequestHandler
desc: An interface through which a single sign-on (SSO) authentication provider extension handles authentication requests.

items.name: func beginAuthorization(with: ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequest)
items.desc: Tells your request handler to authorize the given request.

items.name: func cancelAuthorization(with: ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequest)
items.desc: Tells your request handler to cancel the authorization of the given request.

items.name: class ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequest
items.desc: An authorization request that your provider extension handles.
